metadata.name: Reliable Evaluation Video Samples
metadata.description: Curated sample videos for comprehensive video generation evaluation

videos.prompt: A serene mountain landscape at sunset with rolling hills, snow-capped peaks, and golden light filtering through clouds. The scene should show natural beauty with realistic lighting and atmospheric effects.
A dynamic car chase scene through a city street with realistic motion blur, camera shake, and smooth transitions between frames. The action should maintain spatial coherence and temporal consistency.
A detailed close-up of a vintage camera with intricate mechanical parts, showing realistic textures, lighting, and depth. The object should maintain consistent appearance across all frames.
A person cooking in a modern kitchen, showing realistic human movements, facial expressions, and interaction with kitchen objects. The scene should maintain human anatomy consistency.
A flowing river with realistic water physics, showing natural movement patterns, reflections, and environmental details. The water should exhibit natural fluid dynamics.
